name: FQuantizedReservoirIndicatorData
comment: Struct containing quantized fluid content for a more optimized replication.

properties.name: PackedFlowFill
properties.comment: See setters for how this data is packed.

name: AFGBuildablePipeReservoir
comment: Pipeline for transferring liquid and gases to factory buildings.

methods.name: GetFluidContent
methods.comment: @return The amount of fluid in this storage, may be more than maximum in case of over-pressurization. [m^3]

methods.name: GetFluidContentMax
methods.comment: @return The maximum amount of fluid in this storage. [m^3]

methods.name: GetFlowFill
methods.comment: @return The rate the reservoir is filling. [m^3/s]

methods.name: GetFlowDrain
methods.comment: @return The rate the reservoir is draining. [m^3/s]

methods.name: GetFlowLimit
methods.comment: @return The fill/drain limit, this depends on the number of connection components. [m^3/s]

methods.name: GetFluidDescriptor
methods.comment: @return The type of fluid in this storage.

properties.name: mStackingHeight
properties.comment: When stacking reservoirs how high above should it place

properties.name: mFluidBox
properties.comment: Fluid box used for flow calculations

properties.name: mStorageCapacity
properties.comment: The storage capacity in cubic meters. [m^3]

properties.name: mIndicatorData
properties.comment: Quantized data used by the indicators.

properties.name: mIndicatorFlowFillPct
properties.comment: Smoothed values used by the indicators/UI.
